definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: AYou can buy them at a souvenir shop near the exit.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在出口附近的纪念品店买到。

sentences.english: Professor K P Fung, College Head, presenting souvenirs to Mrs Ng and.
sentences.chinese: 院长冯国培教授致送纪念品予吴女士及同学代表。

sentences.english: His library displayed miscellanea of mementos from different parts of the world, a lifetime of traveling.
sentences.chinese: 他书房里满是浪迹天涯时，搜罗来的世界各地纪念品。

sentences.english: Souvenir products made of Simbircit ornamental stone.
sentences.chinese: 采用观赏石制造纪念品。

sentences.english: The Master gave souvenirs to his disciples, hoping that this would bring them auspiciousness and good health.
sentences.chinese: 恩师为弟子们发送纪念品，祝愿六时吉祥，身心健康。

sentences.english: Four, the Chengdu Giant Panda souvenirs brand sustainable development strategy.
sentences.chinese: 成都熊猫旅游纪念品品牌持续发展的策略。

sentences.english: Prince William approves wedding souvenirs for sale.
sentences.chinese: 威廉王子大婚纪念品开售。

sentences.english: When Uncle Bill went abroad to live, he left me his watch as a souvenir.
sentences.chinese: 比尔叔叔出国时把表留给我作为纪念品。

sentences.english: A scented gift and rememberance designedly dropt.
sentences.chinese: 一件芬芳的礼物或者无意抛落的纪念品。

sentences.english: When Uncle Bill went abroad to live, he left me his watch as a souvenir .
sentences.chinese: 比尔叔叔出国时把表留给我作为纪念品。

sentences.english: We would suggest an alternative souvenir next time.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我们建议乘客下次最好选点别的纪念品。

sentences.english: He has a pitch on the High Street where he sells souvenirs.
sentences.chinese: 他在大街上有个卖纪念品的摆摊处。

sentences.english: The box contained some souvenir coral rocks.
sentences.chinese: 箱子时装着一引作为纪念品的珊瑚石。

sentences.english: A: I’ll get you a souvenir in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我会从巴黎给你带一件纪念品。

definition: gift given when visiting sb (esp. a local specialty brought back from one's travels, or a special product of one's own country taken overseas) (Tw)
to keep as a souvenir/to recall fondly
